模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Controller

类 GameOverScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.BubbleBobble.Controller.GameOverScreenController
public class GameOverScreenController extends Object
The class, GameOverController, is the controller for GameOverScreen, and is linked with GameOverScreen.fxml The GameOver screen contains information:
  1. GameOver title
  2. current score
  3. current level
And the Game Over screen contains several functionalities and entry:
  1. NameInput: input the player game
  2. submit: button to submit the player name
  3. New Game: back to the original start screen
  4. High Score List: view the high score list
  5. quit: quit the application
The GameOver screen also includes some of the validation because it involves writing data to the file, which means data from user manual input should be checked.
